alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 7:16PM CDT until June 10 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Nebraska, including the following county, Greeley. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 715 PM CDT, Radar estimates that 2 to 4 inches of rain fell from strong thunderstorms that moved through the area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Scotia and rural portions of west central Greeley County. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
